name: Don't Play With Rockets
description:
Do you like rockets? Of course you do!

Choose one, light it up, and send it flying!

Be careful though, because what goes up must come down!

Will you be the last one standing?

Don't Play With Rockets  is a simple "last man standing" style game where, each round, players choose a rocket to launch. Each turn, one rocket will misfire, and come crashing back towards the ground, eliminating the player that launched it.

This was a very fun project to work on, and I plan to implement multiplayer in the future with ways to sabotage your friends' rockets!

Purchasing version 1.0 entitles you to ALL future content updates free of charge.

If you experience any issues, or have some ideas/feedback, please let me know either by email (contact.tdindie@gmail.com), or on Twitter (@td_indie)
